protein.specific_function: Regulates mitogenic signal transduction by dephosphorylating both Thr and Tyr residues on MAP kinases ERK1 and ERK2.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Rohan PJ, Davis P, Moskaluk CA, Kearns M, Krutzsch H, Siebenlist U, Kelly K: PAC-1: a mitogen-induced nuclear protein tyrosine phosphatase. Science. 1993 Mar 19;259(5102):1763-6.
